letter.title: Letter from the “Penn, Interrupted" Editor
letter.subhead: On getting old, looking back, and writing it all down
letter.author: Denali Sagner

instagram.subhead: After a year filled with disposable masks, localized climate disasters, and plenty of ennui about coming–of–age in shoebox bedrooms, Street came to a realization: creature comforts are kind of important. So Special Features Editor Denali Sagner took to Locust Walk to ask: What did 2021 mean to you, and what guilty pleasures got you through the year?

finding_our_power.author: Beatrice Forman
finding_our_power.subhead: If there’s one thing I’ve learned from running a magazine during a pandemic, it’s that reporting isn’t a transaction. It’s a conversation.
finding_our_power.title: A Culture of Kindness Begins with Our Sources

finding_our_power.subhead: More universities have committed to fossil fuel divestment. Why hasn’t Penn?
finding_our_power.title: Universities Are Recognizing Their Role in the Climate Crisis. Penn’s Policies Remain Outdated

finding_our_power.subhead: Over a year has passed since the height of the Black Lives Matter movement. What has really changed for Black students on Penn’s campus?
finding_our_power.title: On Being Black @ Penn: What Has Changed Since Summer 2020?

finding_our_power.subhead: What Penn students need to know about the organization pushing for abolition at Penn.
finding_our_power.title: Police Free Penn: Toward an Abolitionist Future

finding_our_place.author: Emily White
finding_our_place.subhead: While Penn Glee Club successfully merged with Sirens to improve gender equity, Mask and Wig still has work to do before calling itself an inclusive space.
finding_our_place.title: As Performing Arts Groups Examine Their Histories, Progress Remains Uneven

finding_our_place.subhead: As COVID–19 exacerbated inequities in the local school district, student volunteers helped make virtual learning impactful.
finding_our_place.title: COVID-19 Forced CSSP Programs Out of Philly Schools. Students Still Found Ways to Show Up.

finding_our_place.title: Diary of a Former Pandemic Barista

finding_our_place.subhead: When the pandemic started, I was applying to transfer out of Penn. Now, I’m glad I didn’t.
finding_our_place.title: How Quarantine Saved My Penn Career

finding_our_voice.title: Notes From The Anxious Girl Underground
